sentences.en: ...fruit which has been treated with insecticide and fumigated.
Also good for seed's long-term preservation. 7. There is a top dosage limit for AITC to fumigate different crop seeds.
sentences.cn: 辣根精油活性成分AITC对不同的作物种子熏蒸时，其使用浓度有一定的限制。

sentences.en: As preventive, spray plants with systemic insecticide or fumigate them regularly.
sentences.cn: 作为预防措施, 要用内吸杀虫剂对植物定期喷洒,或熏蒸.

sentences.en: Fumigate wood packaging has been exported to countries around the world.
sentences.cn: 熏蒸木包装已远销世界各国.

sentences.en: Heat the vinegar, close doors and windows, fumigate in the room from time to time, which can effectively kill the flu virus.
sentences.cn: 把陈醋加热，关上门窗，隔一段时间在房间里熏蒸一次，可有效杀除感冒等病毒。

sentences.en: Objective To research on the efficacy of the fumigate instrument in high mosquito environment of Beiwan.
sentences.cn: 目的通过熏蒸器杀虫实验,研究在北湾蚊虫高密度地区室内快速杀灭蚊虫的方法.
用熏蒸的方法给房间消毒

trans.tran_en: to remove disease,  bacteria  , insects etc from somewhere using chemicals, smoke, or gas
